name: Sesame Street: Elmo and Abby Nature Explorers
summary: Join Elmo and Abby on a fun-filled adventure as they use their imaginations in this new game for MobiGo. You can find learning in the most interesting places, from finding insects hiding in the grass, and planting a variety of different types of plants for their friends, to travelling on a magical journey to exotic animal habitats around the world.
